name: Teleren Starfire episode 1
description:
Run, kick and smash in this thrilling cosmic adventure.

Teleren Starfire is a vertical scrolling, non stop action game where all you have to do is see if you can get the highest score and return the May's Galaxy to it's former self.

While being similar to the Candy rush titles, it also features a whole new move set for May which include jumping over obstacles, speed control and a hidden Starfire power up while keeping what has been in existence like candy powers and the aura dash.

There's also a time meter in game to add tension and urgency to the gameplay.

Players can use the arrow keys for directional movement,

A  performs an aura dash, a sudden burst of energy to destroy enemies,

S for the jump maneuver,

Z when your energy bar(pink bar on the bottom left) is full, press Z for a super attack,

X activates the Starfire power.

The game would be released in episodes  because of certain constraints but have fun and feel free to share feedback after getting the game
